files.name: main.py
files.content:
def printBottles(a):
    print(a, "bottles of Slurm on the wall.")
    print(a, "bottles of Slurm..")
    print("Take one down, pass it around..")
    b = a - 1
    print(b, "bottles of Slurm on the wall.")
   
    
    
a=int(input("How many staring bottles?"))
print(" ")
while (a>=0):
    printBottles(a)
    print(" ")
    a=a-1
    b=a-1
    b=b-1
    if (a == 0):
        break
print("No more bottles of Slurm on the wall!")
